articles.title: Microsoft fixes outage affecting Outlook web users - The Siasat Daily
articles.description: San Francisco: Microsoft has fixed a web access issue affecting Outlook users in North America. The company tweeted from its '@MSFT365Status' account on Tuesday that "we're investigating an Outlook for the web access issue affecting our customers in North Ame…
articles.content:
San Francisco: Microsoft has fixed a web access issue affecting Outlook users in North America.
The company tweeted from its ‘@MSFT365Status’ account on Tuesday that “we’re investigating an Outlook … [+1150 chars]
